title: The Tycoon's Vacation
description: This is the second book in the Baby for the Billionaire series. Drew Titan decides it is time to take a vacation at one of his exotic resorts, and ends up literally running into Trinity Mathews while he is surfing. They end up having a steamy romance over the week long vacation, until she finds out he is the resorts owner, and had lied to her. She has sworn off all business men, since she couldn't seem to find one who knew how to remain faithful to her, which is what landed her at the resort in the first place. She goes back home to discover that her first impulsive thing she has done in her life has left her pregnant and alone, that is until Drew finds her and will not go away until she agrees to marry him. Come enjoy the adventures Drew and Trinity take together in this fun filled story that has love, passion, fighting, and making up. Drew's cousins Derek and Ryan add humor and even more love to the adventure, and will leave you wanting a hunk of your own.Coming in October, the final story in the series, The Tycoon's Proposal.
author: Melody Anne
